hi and welcome you listening to the x 22

people can't get supplies they can't get

here in the United States we are seeing
a lot of things happening and we're

worse and worse and what's very

up like crazy and we see that minuchin
he's out there pushing the idea that
dollar is going to be going higher and
it's completely opposite of what Trump

what's very interesting about all of

but gold is holding steady for some

this is the third day in a row now
normally in the past when they did a

dramatically so it looks like at this
point they're having a little bit of

this is something that we need to watch
and look at very carefully
because as we said as they continually
try to slam goal down and it doesn't
move anymore and every time they try to
slam it down and it starts to move up
well things are about to change and I'm
not talking about moving up like a
dollar or two or ten bucks or twenty
bucks i'm talking about fifty a hundred
a hundred and fifty when you start to
see that you know the countdown has
begun and things are about to change now
continuous jobless claims they are at
the lowest since april of two thousand
and the year of 2000 when the jobless
claims were this low the Nasdaq peaked
at the end of the dot-com boom and then
it collapsed over eighty percent in the
next two years so we are following this

continually decline and every time they

we looking at what's happening with

continuing jobless claims because they

so they're heading in opposite

very quickly actually verizon right now

again not a good sign IBM same thing
caterpillar the same thing and we're

the philly fed manufacturing survey it

22 print missed expectations among the

and since the election where we had all

he is definitely getting prepared and

here he knows that it's time to bring it

on January 17 2017 The Wall Street

the US dollar is too strong and we can

it's raising the interest rates because

they're going to continually try to dump

right now let's just buy gold just in
